divs: Sighting DetailsI was reading CA June 14th "v" shaped contrail report today when i realized the extremely wide and odd contrail matched what i saw this morning over Ottawa Ontario Canada.These contrails also had an odd pattern and were unreasonably wide even for a plane such as the A380.I know this cause recently with all the open sky treaties more planes fly directly over us than i have seen in years.At first i thought the wind might have change the shape and width of the contrails but soon realized they weren't changing at all and remained for a good 30 or so minutes.After reading the report i thought these contrails might be similar to those reported earlier and by filling this report maybe someone else may be able to corilate other such reports.At first i surely would of dismissed these, but reading the CA report i decided i would offer up this report and with any luck someone else will report seeing something more.
trends: There have been 55 other sightings in Ottawa
There were no other sightings in Ottawa on or around June 22nd 2009
